thread.section_title: Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable home away from home
thread.title_full: Comfortable home away from home - Review of Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Allen H
title: Comfortable home away from home
text: We stayed 1 week and were pleased with the hotel. Many business travelers but a fair number of leisure travelers too. Breakfast was nutritious and unvarying. Happy hour Monday thru Wednesday was a nice touch. Rooms were comfortable and quiet. 505 has a pullout bed for a restless sleeper... and comfy.
